Full stack development

Food Affairs Delivery Website

Project Details

Type

  • Contract Work

Duration

  • 3 Months

Role

  • Design
  • Front-end development
  • Backend Development
  • Database Management

Tools

  • Golang
  • Javascript
  • Html & Css
  • Figma
  • Bootstrap

Visit

www.foodaffairs.ng

Work Highlights

  • I used Figma to design and create wireframes, streamlining development by establishing a clear visual representation of the application's structure and design for efficient project execution.

  • I utilized Golang for efficient backend development, handling client-server requests, implementing clean server-side logic, and ensuring thorough testing for reliable functionality.

  • Using Bootstrap, I transformed my Figma designs into a visually appealing and responsive website, ensuring compatibility across all devices. The main focus was on creating an engaging user experience with seamless responsiveness.

  • Lastly, leveraging MySQL as the preferred database, I implemented basic CRUD operations, prioritizing data validation from the client-side. This ensured data integrity, security, and efficient management for seamless application functionality and user experience.

  • The site's main eye-catchers include a dynamic menu page allowing users to place orders, seamlessly transitioning to a secure checkout for payment processing. Additionally, an admin portal offers order management, menu updates, item additions, and an authentication system for enhanced security and control.
